data.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play: Steampunk Costume
data.detailed_description:
Dashing. Daunting. Delightfully dapper! Themed costumes cannot be unlocked through normal gameplay. Purchase these premium sets and you will gain immediate access to Bats and Jokerz themed versions of each!

  • Stalwart Stovepipe
  • Gizmo Bat
  • Trench Warfare
  • Buckled Guvnor
  • Stalker Stockings
  • Artful Goggler
  • Gear Sneer
  • Scarfy Scarf
  • Belted Laughter
  • Bucklie Knucklies
  • Notty Nickers
  • Sinister Spats
  • And more!

fullgame.name: Gotham City Impostors Free to Play

data.supported_languages:
English*, French*, German*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum
  • OS: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU 2.5 GHz
  • Memory: 1.5 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 256MB dedicated memory DX9 Video Card (GeForce 8600 or ATI X1800 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Quad Core CPU 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 7 GB Hard Drive Space
  • Video Card: 512MB DX9 High-Performance Video Card (GeForce 8800 or ATI X1900 or better)
  • DirectX®: DX9
  • Sound: DX9 compatible Sound Controller
  • Additional: Broadband Internet Connection
